briefDescription: Contains fundamental logic for creating windows, drawing, and doing other gpu-related work.
detailedDescription: Contains fundamental logic for creating windows, drawing on windows, and doing other gpu-related work.

You can include header [[compwolf_graphics_platforms]] to get implementation-specific data:
-macro [[compwolf_graphics_vulkan]] is defined, denoting that this library is implemented using vulkan.
-vulkan-specific logic from files included after [[compwolf_graphics_platforms]].
Most logic requires a [[graphics_environment]], which handles program-wide logic.
